name: A Walk in the Park (trashbait, Fabrício Guedes Faria, Arthur Souza, vvilliam, Tiago Marino, Will Leodegario)
name_original: A Walk in the Park (trashbait, Fabrício Guedes Faria, Arthur Souza, vvilliam, Tiago Marino, Will Leodegario)
description:
Play as a dog walker, but be careful, these doggos play hard! 

You need money to buy the new Polystation 6, but you only have 1 day before the stores run out! How much money can you make walking dogs in the park?

Your objective: take as many dogs as you can for a complete walk in the park, from beginning to end, but don't let them run away! They will be distracted and will pull you around. 

Use your trusty stick to direct them to where you want, or use your trump card, the almighty dog treats you got from that strange guy in the alley, to bring them back to you.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to use treats
  • Hold Right Mouse Button and click the Left Mouse Button to throw a stick
Credits:
  • Arthur Rosa de Souza: 3D Art
  • Enrico Montanha Mandeli: 2D Art
  • Fabrício Guedes Faria: Programming
  • Mateus Paludetti: Music
  • Tiago Marino Silva:  Programming
  • William Quelho Ferreira: Programming
  • Willian Gonzaga Leodegario: 3D Art
